Description: Remote On/Off - The inverter can be switched on and off and the BDC can be switched on and off for the battery ready function

Bit0:SPI enable, Bit1:AutoTestStart, Bit2:LVFRT enable, Bit3:FreqDerating Enable, Bit4:Softstart enable, Bit5:DRMS enable, Bit6:PowerVoltFunc Enable, Bit7:HVFRT enable, Bit8:ROCOF enable, Bit9:Recover FreqDeratingMode Enable, Bit10:Split phase, Bit11:AC Couple enable, Bit12~15:Reserve
Notes: 0:disable 1:enable. SPI:system protection interface. Bit0~3:for CEI0-21, Bit4~6:for SAA

Description: CMD Set holding register memory 3,4,5,99 CMD will be set or not(1/0), if not, these settings are the initial value
Notes: Meaning is these settings will be acting or not when next power on
